descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Ben Simmons drives straight to the bucket for a reverse finish off the glass.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Simmons gets inside for the slick finish) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Simmons gets inside for the slick finish

videos.description: Ben Simmons kicks out to Joel Embiid, who knocks down a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Embiid drops in 3-pointer from top of the key) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Embiid drops in 3-pointer from top of the key

videos.description: Joel Embiid shakes off Clint Capela and cruises in for the one-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Embiid blows by Capela for the jam) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Embiid blows by Capela for the jam

videos.description: Trae Young gets off to a hot start as he knocks down buckets on three straight possessions.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae gets buckets on three straight possessions) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae gets buckets on three straight possessions

videos.description: Lou Williams and Bogdan Bogdanovic extend the Hawks' lead with 3-pointers on back-to-back possessions.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Williams, Bogdanovic go back-to-back from 3-point land) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Williams, Bogdanovic go back-to-back from 3-point land

videos.description: Trae Young goes toward the bucket and then lobs it up to John Collins for a two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae feeds Collins on the alley-oop) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae feeds Collins on the alley-oop

videos.description: Joel Embiid drives baseline and between two defenders for the tough and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Embiid beats the double team for and-1) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Embiid beats the double team for and-1

videos.description: Kevin Huerter knocks down a 3-pointer from the corner, and musician Quavo gets hyped on the sidelines.
videos.headline: Quavo hyped after Hawks' 3-pointer

videos.description: Bogdan Bogdanovic can't hit the 3-pointer, but John Collins grabs the rebound and drops in the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Collins cleans up Bogdan's miss with and-1) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Collins cleans up Bogdan's miss with and-1

videos.description: Trae Young drops in a tough floater from the baseline over Joel Embiid.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae skips in joy after tough floater) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae skips in joy after tough floater

videos.description: Seth Curry knocks down a step-back 3-pointer to bring the 76ers closer to the Hawks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Seth Curry cuts Sixers' deficit to single digits) 2021/06/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Seth Curry cuts Sixers' deficit to single digits

videos.description: Bogdan Bogdanovic knocks down a clutch 3-pointer late in the game.
videos.headline: Bogdan quiets crowd with 3-pointer

videos.description: Trae Young lobs a long pass to John Collins, who finishes with an and-1 dunk to put the game out of reach.
videos.headline: Trae and Collins connect for dagger alley-oop
